function jwst_rot1,ang,in_arcsec=in_arsec,in_degree=in_degree,in_radian=in_radion if n_elements(in_radian) ne 1 then in_radian=0 if n_elements(in_degree) ne 1 then in_degree=0 if n_elements(in_arcsec) ne 1 then in_arcsec=((in_degree eq 0) and (in_degree eq 0) ? 1 : 0) rcs_id="$Id: jwst_rot1.pro,v 1.2 2018/03/15 17:38:58 penton Exp penton $" dang=double(ang) ang_degree=(in_degree ? dang : (in_arcsec ? dang/3600. : (dang/!dtor))) ang_arcsec=(in_arcsec ? dang : ang_degree*3600.0D ) ang_radian=(in_radian ? dang : ang_degree * !dtor ) r1=[ [1,0,0],$ [0,cos(ang_radian),(-1.0D)*sin(ang_radian)],$ [0,sin(ang_radian),cos(ang_radian)]] return,r1 end
